verses.name: Acts 15:37
verses.text: And Barnabas determined to take with them John, whose surname was Mark.

verses.name: Acts 15:38
verses.text: But Paul thought not good to take him with them, who departed from them from Pamphylia, and went not with them to the work.

verses.name: Acts 15:39
verses.text: And the contention was so sharp between them, that they departed asunder one from the other: and so Barnabas took Mark, and sailed unto Cyprus;

verses.name: Acts 15:40
verses.text: And Paul chose Silas, and departed, being recommended by the brethren unto the grace of God.

verses.name: Acts 15:41
verses.text: And he went through Syria and Cilicia, confirming the churches.
